name: Fatui Ateş Tetikçisi
desc:
A Fatui secret agent.
The duty of a Fatui agent is to settle debts — but not only those of a monetary or goods-in-kind nature.
They also ensure dues are paid when it comes to the principle of "an eye for an eye." If there is one thing the Fatui are not known for, it is leniency, and whoever dares to oppose them will invoke the full force of their wrath.

dropMaterial.name: Avcının Kurban Bıçağı
dropMaterial.desc: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

dropMaterial.name: Tefecinin Kurban Bıçağı
dropMaterial.desc: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

dropMaterial.name: Müfettişin Kurban Bıçağı
dropMaterial.desc: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts." No one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

dropMaterial.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

dropMaterial.name: Çavuş Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

dropMaterial.name: Subay Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

value.name: Fatui Ateş Tetikçisi
value.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."
